name: $name
values_yaml_content:
registryAddress: '10.0.96.23:60080'
mysqlRootPassword: admin
mysqlUser: db_user
mysqlPassword: '123456'
imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
persistence:
  enabled: false
  accessMode: ReadWriteOnce
  size: 8Gi
resources:
  requests:
    cpu: 100m
    memory: 256Mi
  limits:
    cpu: 200m
    memory: 500Mi
initresources:
  requests:
    cpu: 100m
    memory: 256Mi
  limits:
    cpu: 200m
    memory: 500Mi
configurationFiles: ''
phpmyadmin:
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 256Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 500Mi
loadbalancename: alauda-lb
